FirstPage.YourWeather: Annui lín, bo hand! Á-úgoth in annui lín. Le-go!

Sunny.1: Teitha i glaur lín, edregol lín ned lû êl síla!
Sunny.2: Ae essa na Anor, broniel ú-pherin an mellyn.
Sunny.3: Anor síla, e Glaur neth Annûn síla erinor.

Cloudy.1: Man? Anor nudûn! Ennas beleg vên an *Independence Day*?
Cloudy.2: Nai aiquen nyarna i thala narn...
Cloudy.3: Fain i vîn? Aglar na Tim Burton.

Rainy.1: Aen ammî, aen ammî, cuia i e-bâl lín.
Rainy.2: Nae ennas caun i arpo an *Jurassic Park* orodruin.
Rainy.3: Im beria i raind, im beria i raind

Stormy.1: Broniel en Thor ned i'and tathren.
Stormy.3: Hwind i ven amarth, beria ú-chîb.

Snowy.1: Los aen ben a galad êl síla Ned Narnia.
Snowy.2: I'and ta en Loss, Olaf innas ha'nefad.

Windy.2: Ú-sûl dagor i dha, ú-rangwa i chîb.
Windy.3: Hwind rangwa i, ú-dagor i Quidditch.

Heatwave.2: Súthaeron: ú-châd aiquen ûr Anor a *Dune*.
Heatwave.3: Anor garan raudh lín, athan ú-anún a chîb erinor Ned Mustafar.

Frost.3: Immo ringwaloth, nai aiquen 'The Day After Tomorrow'.

Localisation.SelectedCityDefault: Garth hûl aglar an manath gwen.
